page.title: 08A Royal visit to our town
page.content: On Tuesday 21st.May 1985 the Prince and Princess of Wales came to visit homes in our area.100 year old homes have been renovated by an organisation called the Local Housing Cooperative.Children from class3 describe what happened.Adam said"We waved our flags and gave Diana a rose.Then she went into somebody's house to have cup of tea."Bernard didn't like standing in the crowd"It was noisy and everyone was pushing me!"Nicola noticed that Diana was wearing a red hat and coat and Charles wore a black suit.John bowed to the Princess and gave her flowers.Jaime said"I was waiting in the crowd.I shook hands with Prince Charles and he said that my flag was lovely."All the children from class 3 made their own paper flags to wave to the Royal couple.
